messages.message:
<!here> if you're finding that your sandbox builds are failing in 'retry hell', it's because PreProd Jenkins is entirely overwhelmed right now due to other breakages outside of our control (package updates upstream, glibc mismatches, `yarn` abuse that finally caught up with us, etc.)

We're creating an incident now. Sean and I have largely fixed most folks' build code where we could, but we have to get PreProd back to a stable state. We'll post here when things are back to a good spot.
